page.title: 16Education
page.content: We all attend{Holy Trinity}C.of E. (Controlled) Primary School,Matlock Bath,founded in 1856 but moved to its present site in 1972.There are 85 children attending aged 4.5 to 11. We are taught by the headteacher and three teachers.We study English,Mathe- matics,Science,P.E.,R.E.,projects and art and crafts. The other primary schools in our area are very similar to us.They are{Bonsall}Primary School, {Starkholmes}Primary School,and{Matlock {Town}Primary School. {Highfields}Secondary Comprehensive School,Lower School,site for first and second year children is situated on Starkholmes Road. At Matlock Green there is{Tawny House an adult education centre.Night-school classes are also held at Highfields School.
